content: > join in the knitter s pride > knitterspride /people/knitterspride > / knit pro 1 summer tee kal it > kicks off on monday july 19th and > runs through october 15th 2021 > > > participating in knitter s pride kal > download pattern here 2 ravelry > group here 3 > > participating in the knitpro kal > download pattern here 4 ravelry > group here 5 this cropped summer tee is a quick knit and perfect stash buster for your dk yarns knit from the top down this raglan can be knit with 1 2 3 or more colors the raglan includes a mock cable detail that is continued down the sides of the top this size-inclusive tee is meant to be worn with 6-8 / 15-20 cm of positive ease #sizeinclusive **sizing** finished bust circumference 39¼ 42½ 45½ 48¾ 52¾ 55½ 59½ 63½ 68 71½ 76 / 98 106 5 114 122 132 139 149 159 170 179 190 cm fit intended to wear with 6-8 / 15-20cm positive ease based on actual bust circumference 31 34 37 40 44 47 51 55 59 63 67 / 77 5 85 92 5 100 110 117 5 127 5 137 5 147 5 157 5 167 5 cm to choose your size measure the circumference around the fullest part of your bust then add the amount of positive ease you prefer and choose the closest size **yarn** designed for dk weight yarn the sample is knit in yoth yarns neighbor 100% wool 200 yd / 198 m 95 g using 3 colors c1 blue c2 natural c3 dark blue marl 3-color yarn requirements by yardage c1 174 193 209 233 254 267 296 320 361 388 404 c2 137 152 165 183 201 211 234 252 285 306 319 c3 246 272 295 328 359 377 418 451 510 548 570 yarn requirements by meter c1 159 176 191 212 233 244 271 292 330 355 370 c2 126 139 151 168 183 193 214 231 261 280 292 c3 225 249 269 300 328 345 382 412 466 501 521 2-color yarn requirements by yardage c1 420 465 503 561 613 644 715 771 871 936 975 yd c2 137 152 165 183 201 211 234 252 285 306 319 yd yarn requirements by meter c1 384 425 460 512 561 589 653 705 796 856 891 m c2 126 139 151 168 183 193 214 231 261 280 292 m 1-color yarn requirements by yardage c1 558 617 668 744 814 855 949 1023 1156 1243 1294 yd yarn requirements by meter c1 510 564 611 680 744 782 867 935 1057 1136 1183 m **gauge** 20 sts x 31 row = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette stitch in the round unblocked **needles** us 6 / 4 0 mm or size needed for gauge 16 / 40 cm and 32 / 80 cm circular needles dpns optional **tools** stitch markers qty 9 including 1
